name: Research Academy for Rural Enrichment
briefDescription: Socio-Economic empowerment of people in rural area with the specific objective to enrich the quality of life of the rural citizens through research action, reorganization and reorientation of their social system. The RARE presently working with 1778 people with Disabilities,Persons living with mentall illness and children with out Parental Care and vulnerable Children of Subarnapur and Bolangir district of the State of Odisha
